title: HOUR 1- 081720
itunes:title: HOUR 1- 081720
description:
Dan says that all the hype is on the Lakers series with Portland, but Dan says Las Vegas has named the Clippers as the team to beat. Dan likes the Mavericks to upset the Clippers in the opening series.
